signatures.code: android: Android
ios: iOS
exists(path: string): boolean

summary.text: Checks whether a File with the specified path already exists.
The path to check for.

signatures.code: fromPath(path: string, copy?: boolean): File

summary.text: Gets or creates a File entity at the specified path.
The path to get/create the file at.
An optional value when set, copies the content-uri to a temp file enabling the legacy behaviour

signatures.code: new File(): File

summary.text: Gets the extension of the file.

signatures.code: extension: string

summary.text: Gets the extension of the file.
Gets the size in bytes of the file.

signatures.code: size: number

summary.text: Gets the size in bytes of the file.
Gets a value indicating whether the file is currently locked, meaning a background operation associated with this file is running.

signatures.code: isLocked: boolean

summary.text: Gets a value indicating whether the file is currently locked, meaning a background operation associated with this file is running.

signatures.code: appendText(content: string, encoding?: string): Promise<any>

summary.text: Appends the provided string to the file, using the specified encoding (defaults to UTF-8).
The content to be saved to the file.
An optional value specifying the preferred encoding (defaults to UTF-8).

signatures.code: appendTextSync( content: string, onError?: (error: any) => any, encoding?: string ): void

summary.text: Appends the provided string to the file synchronously, using the specified encoding (defaults to UTF-8).
The content to be saved to the file.
An optional function to be called if some IO-error occurs.
An optional value specifying the preferred encoding (defaults to UTF-8).

signatures.code: append(content: any): Promise<void>

summary.text: Appends the provided binary content to the file.
The binary content to be saved to the file.

signatures.code: appendSync(content: any, onError?: (error: any) => any): void

summary.text: Appends the provided binary content to the file synchronously.
The binary content to be saved to the file.
An optional function to be called if some IO-error occurs.

signatures.code: copy(dest: string): Promise<boolean>

summary.text: Copies a file to a given path.

The path to the destination file.
Returns a Promise with a boolean.

signatures.code: copySync(dest: string, onError?: (error: any) => any): any

summary.text: Copies a file to a given path.
The path to the destination file.

(optional) A callback function to use if any error occurs.
Returns a Promise with a boolean.

Gets the Folder object representing the parent of this entity.
Will be null for a root folder like Documents or Temporary.
This property is readonly.
